content.rendered:
Directed by Vetrimaaran

Written by Vetrimaaran. Suka. Vetrimaaran. Poomani. Gautam Siddharth

Cast Dhanush (Siva Saamy). Manju Warrier (Pachaiyammal). Prakash Raj (Venugopal Seshadri). Pasupathy (Murugesan (Pachaiyammal’s Brother)). Pavan (Venkatesan (Vaddakuran’s Younger Brother)). Aadukalam Naren (Vaddakuran Narasimhan). Ken Karunas (Chidambaram). Ammu Abhirami (Mariyammal (as Abhirami)). A. Venkatesh (Viswanathan (Sivasami’s Boss)). Balaji Sakthivel (Inspector). Subramaniam Siva (Murugan (Sivasamy’s Brother)). Nitish (Pandian (as Nitish Veera)). Velraj (Panchayat Member). Tejeenthan Arunasalam (Velmurugan). Bala Hasan (Rajesh Narasimman (Vaddakuran’s Son)). Munnar Ramesh (Policeman). Sendrayan (Pechimuthu (Sandal Maker)). Adithadi Shivraaj. Jaikrishna. Manimegalai. Subatra Robert. Ismath Banu. S R Pandiyan (Hunter)

Languages Tamil

Production Goldmines Telefilm. V. Creation
